name: History Channel's Civil War: The Battle of Bull Run
name_original: History Channel's Civil War: The Battle of Bull Run
description:
History Channel's Civil War: The Battle of Bull Run is a strategy game developed by MadMinute Games. It came out on 24-01-2005. Activision Value Publishing published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play History Channel's Civil War: The Battle of Bull Run on PC.
